title: Enhances conflicts of interest provisions relating to industrial development agency members and employees; repealer
summary: Enhances conflicts of interest provisions relating to industrial development agency members and employees to require industrial development officers and employees to disclose any interest in a project.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the general municipal law, in relation to conflicts of interest involving members or employees of an industrial development agency; and to repeal section 883 of such law relating thereto
